message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small edge, but don't get too excited, it's still a good deal for me!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not too big, since you're trying to lowball me!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. This is my best offer so far!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I still think I deserve a bit more. You're getting a good deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a tiny bit more. This is my final offer!
